metadata.titel_preek: A Gospel For Those Who Are Afraid

kernfrasen: heavenly Father to possess and to keep us
partner who goes it with us
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: FAITH IS BEING OWNED BY A LOVING PARENT

kernfrasen: spread their venom and secrete their poison
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: SIN/FEAR IS AN INFECTION; PRAYER IS SURGERY

kernfrasen: go a piece of the way home with me
end of the last mile of our mortal journey
wandering aimlessly across the face of their years

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: Fear turns the meadows of our souls into dismal swamps, growing their awful plants of dread and terror.

doeldomein.theologisch_concept: The psychological effect of unconfessed fear

cognitieve_implicaties: Fear is organic and grows if not tended
theologische_implicaties: Sanctification involves 'drainage' or clearing of the subconscious
ethische_implicaties: The believer must practice emotional transparency
onbedoelde_consequenties: Natural landscapes (swamps) are demonized as inherently evil

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher uses vivid, sensory language ('venom', 'festering') to reactivate the source domain of physical decay.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The sermon moves from the external chaos (Storm at Sea) to internal chaos (Psychological Fear), using the 'Presence of Christ' as the unifying bridge.

incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: The preacher shifts from the security of being 'property' (assets on a sheet) to the equality of 'partnership'.
incoherentie_punten.entailment_conflict: An asset is passive and controlled; a partner is active and collaborative.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The 'Friend' (Relational) becomes the 'Guide' (Journey) who walks the 'last mile'.

sterktes.beschrijving: Re-activates the 'Shepherd' or 'Guide' metaphor through the cultural lens of the Creole bayou.
sterktes.voorbeeld: Will you go a piece of the way home with me?

risicos.beschrijving: The gospel is framed primarily as a solution to 'jittery' nerves and 'neurosis' rather than a solution to ontological sin.
risicos.voorbeeld: The gospel is also good news for all of our anxieties and fears.
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregation may view God as a divine therapist rather than Lord.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: A storm-tossed boat on the Sea of Galilee.
sub_worlds: The modern 'city life' of rush and ruin
The dark Creole bayou at night

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: High; bridges the biblical text to the hearer's immediate anxiety.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: Using the 'Shadow of a great rock' and 'Master' imagery.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Fits a service of lament or comfort.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon relies heavily on the Relational and Medical domains. It successfully moves from 'God as Master' (Economic/Legal) to 'God as Friend' (Relational). The landscape of the 'swamp' serves as a powerful psychological source domain for the target of 'repressed fear'.

revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: We are not just property; we are the King's signet ring.

coherentie_verbeteringen.incoherentie: The transition between 'Fear as a gift' and 'Fear as a swamp'.
coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Use the 'Fire' metaphor: Fear as a controlled hearth-fire vs. a forest fire.

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: Suggests sin is an external infection rather than a volitional act.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Balance with the 'Unjust Judge' imagery to maintain moral agency.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To provide a sense of 'structure' to the soul against the 'swamp' imagery.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using embodied experience (the bayou, the storm) to map abstract psychological states.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: Focuses on the cognitive mapping of 'ownership' rather than just the beauty of the 'swamp' prose.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Analyzes the conceptual structure of the 'Journey' rather than just the four learning styles.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: Reveals that the preacher's solution to fear is a shift in 'Container' logic: from being 'loose' in the world to being 'in' the boat/hand of God.

volledige_metafoor_lijst: God sitting King of the floods
Alarm clock in the moment of peril
Last mile of our mortal journey
appendices.notities: The use of 'Creole bayou' is a significant 'Living Metaphor' that provides cultural embedding.
